title: If the licensees agree to provide meters on upper floors, the licensees' cables shall be segregated from consumers' cables by a partition in the duct
clause_text: If the licensees agree to provide meters on upper floors, the licensees' cables shall be segregated from consumers' cables by a partition in the duct. Meter rooms on upper floors shall not open into staircase enclosures and shall be ventilated directly to open air outside.
